thread.title: These Houston restaurants have health inspection violations
thread.title_full: These Houston restaurants have health inspection violations - Houston Chronicle

author: chron.com
title: These Houston restaurants have health inspection violations
text:
Image 1 of / 21 21 Golden Cafe Chinese Restaurant 1430 West 19th Street Houston, Texas, 77008
Demerits: 15
Inspection Highlights: Establishment not removing dead/trapped (insects/rodents/pests) from premises at frequency that prevents the accumulation of pests; Observed cloth towels lined under cooking equipment and on prep table. Discontinue the use of cloth towels and use an easily cleanable, non-absorbent material.
Golden Cafe Chinese Restaurant 1430 West 19th Street Houston, Texas,... Image 2 of 21 Charles Donut Shop 922 East Tidwell Houston, Texas, 77022
Demerits: 15
Inspection Highlights: Discarded loose mound of dough because it wasn't wrapped properly. Internal temperature of potentially hazardous foods (sausage patties and eggs (cooked)) not maintained at 41*F and below in cold storage.
Photo: Google Maps Charles Donut Shop 922 East Tidwell Houston, Texas, 77022
Demerits:... Image 3 of 21 Tony's Barbecue & Steakhouse 17052 Saturn Lane Houston, Texas, 77058
Demerits: 16
Inspection Highlights: Roaches (both dead and alive) observed in the mop sink room. Ice machine quarantined due to cloudy water in water tray. Dishwashing machine quarantined due to it not sanitizing.
Photo: Google Maps Tony's Barbecue & Steakhouse 17052 Saturn Lane Houston, Texas,... Image 4 of 21 Timmy Chan's Restaurant 206 West Little York Road Houston, Texas, 77076
Demerits: 16
Inspection Highlights: Not properly storing rice (final notice). Shrimp thawing under improper conditions (final notice). Female employee not wearing hair restraint while handling food (final notice). Cloth towel found under cutting board (final notice). Dumpster open while not in actual use (final notice). No certified manager on duty (final notice). Dead roach found in food storage room.
Photo: Google Maps Timmy Chan's Restaurant 206 West Little York Road Houston, Texas,... Image 5 of 21 Huynh Restaurant 912 Saint Emanuel Houston, Texas, 77003
Demerits: 16
Inspection Highlights: Dishwasher quarantined because it did not properly dispense the wash, rinse and sanitize agents. Potentially hazardous food not cooled down properly within six hours. Employee found drinking from an open beverage container in a manner which contaminates employees hands, exposed food, and clean equipment/utensils
Huynh Restaurant 912 Saint Emanuel Houston, Texas, 77003
Demerits: ... Image 6 of 21 Don Luis Mexican Restaurant 7606 Irvington Houston, Texas, 77022
Demerits: 16
Inspection Highlights: Potentially hazardous food not stored at proper temperature. Use of walk-in coolers and display coolers for the storage of potentially hazardous foods has been discontinued until 41 degrees Fahrenheit and below is maintained. Single-use glove worn by food employee not discarded when interruption in operation occurred/when damaged/when soiled; Observed employee wash hands with gloves on.
Photo: Google Maps Don Luis Mexican Restaurant 7606 Irvington Houston, Texas,... Image 7 of 21 Sarita's Taqueria 10305 Bauman Road Houston, Texas, 77076
Demerits: 17
Inspection Highlights: Employee observed serving food while not wearing gloves. Potentially hazardous food not stored at proper temperature. Observed dirty refried bean equipment. Moist cloths used for food spills on kitchenware/food-contact surfaces of equipment not stored in sanitizing solution between uses. Observed dirty hot-holding units that are not in use.
Photo: Google Maps Sarita's Taqueria 10305 Bauman Road Houston, Texas, 77076
Demerits:. .. Image 8 of 21 Pollos Asados El Regio 11106 Airline Houston, Texas, 77037
Demerits: 17
Inspection Highlights: Employees observed not wearing effective hair restrained in food prep area. Observed sides, walls, and floors around the cooking equipment and food preparation area itself not cleaned as often as necessary to prevent accumulations of food debris/grease/oil/other possible food contaminants.
Photo: Google Maps Pollos Asados El Regio 11106 Airline Houston, Texas, 77037
Demerits: ... Image 9 of 21 Shipley Donut Shop 11431 Airline Drive Houston, Texas, 77037
Demerits: 18
Inspection Highlights: Potentially hazardous food not stored at proper temperature, including creamer. Observed grease/oils, icing, and other food debris on food equipment used to make donuts. Operating a food service establishment without posting a valid Food Dealer's Permit.
Photo: Google Maps Shipley Donut Shop 11431 Airline Drive Houston, Texas, 77037
Demerits:. .. Image 10 of 21 El Regio Pollo Asado 61 Tidwell Houston, Texas, 77022
Demerits: 19
Inspection Highlights: Cross contamination not prevented by proper storing of food in packages, containers, or wrappings; Observed sausage removed from original packages and stored in cardboard box that packages were removed from. Potentially hazardous foods not stored at proper temperature. Paper towels or hand-drying device not provided at hand sink in prep areas (final notice).
Photo: Google Maps El Regio Pollo Asado 61 Tidwell Houston, Texas, 77022
Demerits:. .. Image 11 of 21 Chasin' Tails Sports Bar 2402 Bay Area Boulevard Suite M Houston, Texas, 77058
Demerits: 19
Inspection Highlights: Fish and shrimp thawing under improper conditions. Employee observed not wearing proper hair restrained while handling food. Gnats observed near the back door and mop sink. Observed food establishment engaging in preparation without the person having in his possession a Food Service Manager's Certification.
Photo: Google Maps Chasin' Tails Sports Bar 2402 Bay Area Boulevard Suite M Houston,... Image 12 of 21 Speedy Burger 6303 Irvington Boulevard Houston, Texas, 77022
Demerits: 20
Inspection Highlights: Ham and eggs relocated to another storage unit after potentially hazardous foods founds stored at improper temperatures. Soda nozzles/spigots needed to be cleaned and sanitized.
Photo: Google Maps Speedy Burger 6303 Irvington Boulevard Houston, Texas, 77022
Demerits:. .. Image 13 of 21 La Fisheria Cocina Mexican Del Mar 4705 Inker Street Houston, Texas, 77007
Demerits: 20
Inspection Highlights: Dried rodent droppings found in stairs area; Effective measures intended to minimize the presence of rodents on the premises not utilized. 30 pounds of beans condemned after being stored at improper conditions. Potentially hazardous foods being improperly thawed in water. Food employee did not wash hands and exposed portion of his/her arms for 20 seconds during work to keep them clean. Operating a food preparation area without the food service manager having in his possession a Food Service Manager's Certification.
Photo: Google Maps La Fisheria Cocina Mexican Del Mar 4705 Inker Street Houston, Texas,... Image 14 of 21 JoJos Asian Bistro 23940 Easttex Freeway Humble, Texas, 77339
Demerits: 20
Inspection Highlights: Observed tools/equipment for repairs ( screwdrivers, lawn water faucet nozzle) and food (peanuts) uncovered on the same shelf. Raw food removed from original containers observed being stored in uncovered containers. Observed no sanitizing solution in sanitizing buckets. Dish-washing machine did not provide enough chlorine for final rinse sanitizing.
Photo: Google Maps JoJos Asian Bistro 23940 Easttex Freeway Humble, Texas,... Image 15 of 21 El Poblano 12825 South Post Oak Road Suite F3 Houston, Texas, 77045
Demerits: 22
Inspection Highlights: Potentially hazardous, ready-to-eat kolaches were on display/cooked/served/held for service using time only, as a public health control not marked with the discard time of 4 hours past the point food is removed from temperature control. No temperature measuring device was provided or used with potentially hazardous food.
Photo: Google Maps El Poblano 12825 South Post Oak Road Suite F3 Houston, Texas,... Image 16 of 21 Brenda's Taqueria 9990 Bissonnet Street Houston, Texas, 77036
Demerits: 29
Inspection Highlights: Chicken not safe for human consumption. Chicken and beef not stored at proper temperature in cold storage. Shrimp observed being thawed under improper conditions. Observed various refrigerated facilities storing potentially hazardous food with: no numerically scaled thermometer / with no accurate indicating thermometer. Garbage dumpsters open while not in actual use. Operating a food preparation area without the food service manager having in her possession a Food Service Manager's Certification.
Photo: Google Maps Brenda's Taqueria 9990 Bissonnet Street Houston, Texas,... Image 17 of 21 Taqueria Los Jaliscienses #10 4325 Irvington Boulevard Houston, Texas, 77009
Demerits: 33
Inspection Highlights: Food employee contacted exposed, read-to-eat food with bare hands. Raw beef stored over read-to-eat foods in refrigerator. Potentially hazardous, ready-to-eat food prepared/packaged and held refrigerated for more than 24 hours not clearly marked to indicate time food is prepared and disposition date. Devices used to trap insects by adherence not properly installed to protect from exposure to food. Operating a food preparation area without the food service employee having in his possession a Food Service Manager's Certification
Taqueria Los Jaliscienses #10 4325 Irvington Boulevard Houston,... Image 18 of 21 Lazeeza Restaurant 5711 Hillcroft Suite C-6 Houston, Texas, 77036
Demerits: 36
Inspection Highlights: Beef not safe for human consumption. Potentially hazardous food (beef) stored at improper conditions. Failure to provide water at 110 degrees. Multi-use equipment not maintained in good repair.
Photo: Google Maps Lazeeza Restaurant 5711 Hillcroft Suite C-6 Houston, Texas,... Image 19 of 21 New Tan Loc Restaurant 8282 Bellaire Boulevard Suite 126 Houston, Texas, 77036
Demerits: 39
Inspection Highlights: Operating a food service/processing establishment not conforming to requirements of Article II. T.C. for sewage back into the kitchen. Potentially hazardous food stored at improper temperatures. Observed person-in-charge (owning / operating) a food establishment without having in his possession a Food Service Manager's Certification. Certified manager / owner arrived during the inspection.
Photo: Google Maps New Tan Loc Restaurant 8282 Bellaire Boulevard Suite 126 Houston,... Image 20 of 21 Dippin Dots 500 Baybrook Mall Suite 5518 Houston, Texas, 77546
Demerits: 53
Inspection Highlights: Failure to provide water at 110° F. Observed person-in-charge (owning/operating) a food establishment without having in his possession a Food Service Manager's Certification.
Photo: Google Maps Dippin Dots 500 Baybrook Mall Suite 5518 Houston, Texas,... Image 21 of 21 These Houston restaurants have health inspection violations 1 / 21 Back to Gallery Houstonians head out to restaurants to satisfy their appetite -- not to lose it. But a glance at this week's list of restaurant violations might have you doing just that.
We took a look at this week's violations and hand-picked some of the more noteworthy ones we found. From critters being found to food being improperly stored, there's no telling what health inspectors could find when they visit a local eatery.
During health inspections, inspectors distribute violations that carry a weight between 1 and 25, increasing in severity. The Houston Chronicle obtained the results of routine health inspections throughout the city and tallied each restaurant's demerits for a comprehensive list of violations.
Click the slideshow above to see some of the notable inspections between Sept. 21-27, 2015.
Hungry for more? Take a look at previous restaurant violations we found:
Sept. 14-20 Houston restaurant violations Aug. 31-Sept. 6 Houston restaurant violations Aug. 17-23 Houston restaurant violations
